Mod.name: Mould
Mod.description:
[h1] Mould [/h1]
An expansion primarily based around hunting and exploration. NOW WITH 100% MORE MOULD!
[h1] Current Features: [/h1] New weapons, new spells, a 3rd Sun, new bosses, a method to revive certain bosses, new biomes to fill the empty areas of the map, new materials, Changes to drops, archaeology, reintroducing old spells and world generation changes.
[h1] Compatibility [/h1] Mould is now compatible with these mods: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2263080245 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2479652426 (and you can use the biomes from all 3 at once) [b] To ensure that the mods load correctly, have them in this order: [/b] Mould Noitavania Flesh Biome
[b] Github: https://github.com/mole-den/mould_n [/b] [b] Discord: https://discord.gg/tgdN6kHZhy [/b]
[b] Special Thanks:[/b] Master of Copium, Gustavo, Extol, Evaisa, TheOneTheOnlySpoopyBoi
